Package com.hexaware.dao

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IEmployeeService
    Interface for performing CRUD operations on employee records.
    IFinancialRecordService
    Interface for performing CRUD operations on financial records.
    IPayrollService
    Interface for performing operations related to payroll management.
    ITaxService
    Interface for performing operations related to tax calculation and management.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EmployeeService
    Service class to perform CRUD operations on employee data.
    FinancialRecordService
    Service class to perform CRUD operations on financial records.
    PayrollService
    Service class for payroll-related operations.
    TaxService
    Service class for tax-related operations.
    ValidationService
    Service class for validating employee-related operations.
